meta.source: National Bank of Ethiopia (NBE) - Annual Report & Quarterly Reports (2023/24)
meta.note: Numbers below are seeded from NBE tables and public summaries. Please verify exact table values in the cited NBE reports before publication.

indicators.title: Headline Inflation (YoY %)
indicators.definition: Year-on-year percentage change in the Consumer Price Index (CPI). Source: NBE / ESS via NBE tables.

indicators.title: GDP at Current Market Price (Million ETB)
indicators.definition: GDP at current market prices (in million Birr). Source: NBE annual macroeconomic indicators.

indicators.title: Broad Money (M2) (Annual % change)
indicators.definition: Annual growth rate of Broad Money (M2). Source: NBE monetary statistics.

indicators.title: NBE Policy Rate (%)
indicators.definition: Official policy rate set by the NBE (indicator of monetary stance). Source: NBE.

indicators.title: Exchange Rate (ETB per USD, end-period)
indicators.definition: Nominal exchange rate, Birr per 1 USD (end of period). Source: NBE daily/annual statistics.
